name: Vertical scroll slideshow gallery v2
author: Gopi Ramasamy

sections.description:
Check official website for live demo http://www.gopiplus.com/work/2010/07/18/vertical-scroll-slideshow-gallery-v2/

  • Live Demo Live Demo
  • More Information More Information
  • User Comments User Comments

Vertical scroll slideshow gallery plugin will create the vertical scrolling image slideshow gallery on the wordpress widget. Image will scroll one by one on the gallery.

Features of this plugin

  • Simple
  • Easy installation.
  • Widgets, so you can add pretty much anything.
  • Easy slideshow size (width & height) override option.

Translators

  • English (en_EN) – Gopi Ramasamy
  • Polish (pl_PL) – Abdul Sattar
sections.faq:
Q1. I installed the plugin but can’t see it. What’s wrong?

Q2. How to upload my image?

Q3. Why my image gallery is out of range?

Q4. Why my slideshow is not scrolling properly or why one image overlaps another at the time of scroll?
sections.changelog:
9.1

  1. Tested up to 5.9

9.0

  1. Tested up to 5.8
  2. Use plugin short code in the widget.

8.9

  1. Tested up to 5.7

8.8

  1. Tested up to 5.5

8.7

  1. Tested up to 5.4

8.6

  1. Tested up to 5.3

8.5

  1. Tested up to 5.2
  2. Uninstall option added. All plugin reference and plugin table will be cleared during uninstallation.
  3. Converted admin JS alert message into WP class file.
  4. No XML used for image loading.
  5. Big change in this plugin from version 7.5, from this version onwards, separate admin page to add/upload images. Also please note that the change in short code.

  1. Tested up to 4.9

  2. Sanitization added for all input value.

7.2

  1. Tested up to 3.8
  2. Now this plugin supports localization (or internationalization). i.e. option to translate into other languages.
    Plugin *.po file (vertical-scroll-slideshow.po) available in the languages folder.

Minor change in the admin layout.

7.0
